00001 // File:        pb2json.h
00002 // Description: This header file for protobuf message and json interconversion 
00003 // Notes:       ---
00004 // Author:      Haust <wyy123_2008@qq.com>

00006 
00007 #pragma once
00008 
00009 #include "svr/3rd/json.hpp"
00010 
00011 #include <google/protobuf/descriptor.h>
00012 #include <google/protobuf/message.h>
00013 
00014 class Pb2Json{
00015     public:
00016         using Json = nlohmann::json;
00017         using ProtobufMsg = ::google::protobuf::Message;
00018         using ProtobufReflection = ::google::protobuf::Reflection;
00019         using ProtobufFieldDescriptor = ::google::protobuf::FieldDescriptor;
00020         using ProtobufDescriptor = ::google::protobuf::Descriptor;
00021 
00022     public:
00023         static bool Json2Message(const Json& json, ProtobufMsg &message);
00024         static void Message2Json(const ProtobufMsg& message, Json& json);
00025 
00026     protected:
00027         static bool Json2RepeatedMessage(const Json& json, ProtobufMsg& message,
00028                 const ProtobufFieldDescriptor* field, const ProtobufReflection *reflection);
00029         static void RepeatedMessage2Json(const ProtobufMsg& message,
00030                 const ProtobufFieldDescriptor *field,
00031                 const ProtobufReflection *reflection,
00032                 Json& json);
00033 
00034 };
